success_criteria: Linting passes; Unit test suite passes; Code coverage > 80%; Security scan (Snyk) finds 0 critical/high vulnerabilities.
failure_action: Block PR merge; Post failure report as a PR comment.
escalation_procedure: PR author is responsible for fixing.
business_impact: Prevents defects and security vulnerabilities from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: Critical path E2E test suite (User Login, Place Order) passes with 100% success rate.
failure_action: Trigger P1 alert to on-call engineer; Halt further deployments; Initiate automated rollback if configured.
tools_used: GitHub Actions; Cypress; Detox; Prometheus Alertmanager.
escalation_procedure: On-call engineer investigates and coordinates a fix.
business_impact: Provides rapid feedback on the health of a new build in an integrated environment.

success_criteria: Full E2E regression suite passes (>99%); Performance tests meet all benchmarks; No outstanding P0/P1 bugs for the release; Manual UAT sign-off from Product Owner.
failure_action: Block production deployment; Release is postponed until criteria are met.
escalation_procedure: Release manager convenes a Go/No-Go meeting.
business_impact: Final quality check to ensure a stable and reliable release for customers.
